mapper.select: select (select count(*) from `baby_umbrellainfo` bl where bl.`create_time` < now() and (bl.`pay_result`='success' OR bl.`pay_result` is null) and `baby_id` is not null and `baby_id` !='' and bl.openid !='') +(select count(*)*2 from `baby_umbrellainfo` bl where bl.`create_time` < now() and (bl.`pay_result`='success' OR bl.`pay_result` is null) and `baby_id` is null and bl.openid !='') +(select count(*) from `umbrella_familyinfo` where `umbrella_id` in ( select id from `baby_umbrellainfo` bl where bl.`create_time` < now() and (bl.`pay_result`='success' OR bl.`pay_result` is null) and bl.openid !='')) as a
